duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide fast, friendly, helpful, and efficient customer service at all times.
Manage day-to-day operation of the deli department, including scheduling, inventory maintenance, and financial aspects.
Merchandise all deli food products, including pricing, rotation, shelf allotment, and displays.
Prepare in-store made prepared food programs and chickens and side orders for Roaster Chicken program.
Perform sanitation duties within the department in accordance with corporate and state regulations.
Stock deli warehouse orders and operate deli department product-weight scales and slicers.
Maintain Cold case logs, Hot food logs, and Cooling logs consistent with store policy.
Control shrink through adherence to related policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: High School Degree or equivalent. 6-12 months of related experience.
